title: I Don't Love You : A Contemporary Romance Novel of Fiery Passion and Deceitful Love Triangles
description: Cassandra and Eugene are two lovers trying to find each other… only to be torn apart by shadowy pasts and indiscretions. Will fate be able to hold them together, or will time simply keep them apart? Cassandra Greyson is a beautiful and whimsical young Los Angeles businesswoman who is accustomed to manifesting love and success.  With countless failed relationships and wrong turns under her belt, Cassandra realizes that she is the only one that holds the power of finding her truth to life and the ability to start living life on her own terms. Fate leads Cassandra to California golden-boy Eugene Conrad, a strikingly handsome and confident real estate professional, who is familiar with getting his way in life and with women. However, as he starts to fall for Cassandra, his penchant for drugs and alcohol soon becomes apparent. I Don’t Love You is an exhilarating Romantic suspense novel that lures Romance readers into a delightfully sinful world of deceitful relationships, love triangles and deception. As Cassandra and Eugene’s blossoming relationship heats up with undeniable passion, shocking secrets are uncovered and dark mysteries are unveiled, as passion slowly decays to murder. Cassandra is forced to come to terms with the reality of the dreams she has manifested, as she struggles to prevent hearing the words that nobody ever wants to hear… “I Don’t Love You”. Page Up and Order Now.
author: Vanessa Tello
